00066 INT MPulseTimeSeparation_init()
00067 {
00068   // This histogram has the pulse times on the X-axis and the number of pulses on the Y-axis
00069   // One histogram is created for each detector
00070 
00071   std::map<std::string, std::string> bank_to_detector_map = gSetup->fBankToDetectorMap;
00072   for(std::map<std::string, std::string>::iterator mapIter = bank_to_detector_map.begin(); 
00073       mapIter != bank_to_detector_map.end(); mapIter++) { 
00074 
00075     std::string detname = gSetup->GetDetectorName(mapIter->first);
00076     std::string histname = "h" + detname + "_PulseSeparation";
00077     std::string histtitle = "Plot of the time difference between consecutive pulses for the " + detname + " detector";
00078     TH1I* hPulseTimeDiff = new TH1I(histname.c_str(),histtitle.c_str(),200,0,200);
00079     hPulseTimeDiff->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference Between Consecutive Pulses [ms]");
00080     hPulseTimeDiff->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of pulse pairs");
00081     hPulseTimeDiff->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00082 
00083     time_separation_histogram_map[mapIter->first] = hPulseTimeDiff;
00084 
00085     histname = "h" + detname + "_PulseSeparationWRTFirstPulse";
00086     histtitle = "Plot of the time difference wrt the first pulse for the " + detname + " detector";
00087     hPulseTimeDiff = new TH1I(histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(),200,0,200);
00088     hPulseTimeDiff->GetXaxis()->SetTitle("Time Difference Between wrt the First Pulse [ms]");
00089     hPulseTimeDiff->GetYaxis()->SetTitle("Number of pulse pairs");
00090     hPulseTimeDiff->SetBit(TH1::kCanRebin);
00091 
00092     time_separation_wrt_first_pulse_histogram_map[mapIter->first] = hPulseTimeDiff;
00093   }
00094 
00095   return SUCCESS;
00096 }
00097 
00101 INT MPulseTimeSeparation(EVENT_HEADER *pheader, void *pevent)
00102 {
00103         // Get the event number
00104         int midas_event_number = pheader->serial_number;
00105 
00106         // Some typedefs
00107         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandMap;
00108         typedef pair<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> > TStringPulseIslandPair;
00109         typedef map<string, vector<TPulseIsland*> >::iterator map_iterator;
00110 
00111         // Fetch a reference to the gData structure that stores a map
00112         // of (bank_name, vector<TPulseIsland*>) pairs
00113         TStringPulseIslandMap& pulse_islands_map =
00114                 gData->fPulseIslandToChannelMap;
00115 
00116         // Loop over the map and get each bankname, vector pair
00117         for (map_iterator theMapIter = pulse_islands_map.begin(); theMapIter != pulse_islands_map.end(); theMapIter++) 
00118         {
00119           std::string bankname = theMapIter->first;
00120           std::vector<TPulseIsland*> thePulses = theMapIter->second;
00121                         
00122           // Loop over the TPulseIslands and plot the histogram
00123           for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::iterator thePulseIter = thePulses.begin(); thePulseIter != thePulses.end(); thePulseIter++) {
00124             
00125             //      if ((*thePulseIter)->GetPulseLength() == 4) {
00126               if (thePulseIter!=thePulses.begin()) 
00127                 time_separation_histogram_map[bankname]->Fill( ((*thePulseIter)->GetTimeStamp() - (*(thePulseIter-1))->GetTimeStamp()) * (*thePulseIter)->GetClockTickInNs() * 1e-6); // ns->ms
00128 
00129               int initial_time_stamp = (*thePulses.begin())->GetTimeStamp();
00130 
00131               double pulse_frequency = 65; // Hz
00132               double pulse_period = (1 / pulse_frequency) * 1e9; // ns
00133          
00134               if (initial_time_stamp * (*thePulseIter)->GetClockTickInNs() > pulse_period) {
00135                 initial_time_stamp += pulse_period / (*thePulseIter)->GetClockTickInNs();
00136               }
00137 
00138               time_separation_wrt_first_pulse_histogram_map[bankname]->Fill( ((*thePulseIter)->GetTimeStamp() - initial_time_stamp)  * (*thePulseIter)->GetClockTickInNs() * 1e-6); // ns->ms             
00139               //            }
00140           }
00141         }
00142         return SUCCESS;
00143 }
